title: This might be tough...
content:
My co-worker hands me this and tells me we need the font to match a storefront. I’m afraid my skills aren’t enough to match a font only from two hand-traced letters; can you guys help?

[http://www.studioangelus.com/images/sh.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071013234209/http:/www.studioangelus.com/images/sh.gif "http://www.studioangelus.com/images/sh.gif") if the attachment doesn’t work.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sh.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071013234209/http:/typophile.com/files/sh.gif) | 88.26 KB |

 [‹ EGOR font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071013234209/http:/typophile.com/node/12187 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tree Carved Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071013234209/http:/typophile.com/node/12081 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cieldailes

comments.content: ...And I suggested that to him. Last time I let him be definitive about a font. ^\_^
